did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection contains newsletters, newspapers, magazines, and other periodicals produced by Native American and non-Native American sources.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection contains newsletters, newspapers, magazines, and other periodicals produced by Native American and non-Native American sources. The topics cover a wide range of subjects. Most of the items are from the United States, but Canada, Mexico, and some other international publications are also included. The content of the printed material varies and includes news items, event coverage, biographical information, historical articles, politics, activism, culture, photographs, etc. Also some correspondence regarding the publications. The collection was split between Non-Indian and Indian published items. There are also older issues of popular newspapers that were collected by the Huntington Free Library, these do not necessarily contain articles regarding Native Americans.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: Only a fraction of the actual subject headings are given in the record.
See also the Native American subject vertical file, #9205, Native American artist vertical file, #9241, and Native American biography vertical file, #9242.
